entry.title: Lutron Pico White Smart Remote Control Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lutron
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 27.98

LUTRON Pico White Smart Remote Control Kit

The Pico remote control is a convenient way to control Lutron Caseta Wireless dimmers. With the Pico you can turn lights on, off, brighten, or darken them from anywhere in the room. Use the "favorite' button to save your favorite light level. This package comes with a Pico remote control, a wall plate bracket and a coordinating wall plate, which will allow you to conveniently mount the Pico directly to a wall for an additional point of control.

  • Provides wireless control of Caseta Wireless in-wall and plug-in lamp dimmers (no wiring required)

  • Turn ON/OFF or dim/brighten lights with the touch of a button from anywhere in the room

  • Can be used to replace an existing switch in a 3-way application

  • Uses Clear Connect RF Technology – Lutron's latest advancement of highly reliable RF technology that ensures seamless communication between

  • Includes (1) Pico remote control, (1) wall plate bracket, and (1) coordinating wall plate

entry.title: Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer with LED+ Technology
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lutron
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 38.97

Lutron Sunnata Touch Dimmer with LED+ Technology

Product Overview

The new Sunnata Touch Dimmer is Lutron's next innovation in dimming technology, allowing users to simply touch and swipe to adjust the brightness of their lighting. Featuring an on/off paddle switch along with touch-based dimmer that fits in a standard wall plate opening and advanced dimming technology designed for compatibility with a range of high efficacy lighting types. These dimmers are UL listed to control LED (dimmable with integrated drivers), halogen, incandescent and/or compact fluorescent (dimmable with integrated ballasts) lamps. They can be used in single-pole or 3-way mechanical switch operations and do NOT require neutral wiring to operate.

Power Ratings and Performance Features:

  • 120V / 60Hz operation
  • Maximum load: 150W dimmable LED/CFL or 600W incandescent/halogen or mixed bulb per type (see multigang and mixed bulb type ratings on spec sheet)
  • Easy adjustment of preset light levels, light bar indicator/nightlight brightness, and high and low ends
  • Power-failure memory
  • Electrostatic discharge tested
  • Precise color matching
  • Includes a front accessible service switch (FASS) for safe bulb replacement
  • No neutral wire required
  • 1 year limited warranty

entry.title: NightFox Button Electronic Photocontrol, 120-277 Volt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Intermatic
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 16.50

NightFox Button Electronic Photocontrol, 120-277 Volt

NightFox™ electronic photocontrols permanently install on outdoor electrical boxes, in-wall boxes, or outdoor lighting fixtures. Ideal for LED fixtures with long-life expectations. Mounts internally to an enclosure with a 3/8” diameter window for light sensing. Comes with 9" wire leads.

 

Features
  • Non-drift silicon light sensor with IR filter
  • DC relay with zero-crossing circuitry for extended life
  • Conformal coated PCB
  • 15-year design life
  • Exceeds 10,000 ON/OFF switching cycles
  • Fail ON mode
  • Ideal for single or multi fixture HID and LED installations (up to 1,650 W @ 277 VAC)
  • 255 J MOV surge protection element
  • Mounts internally to an enclosure with a 3/8” diameter window for the light sensor
  • #18 AWG wire leads

entry.title: GU10 Whip Adapter for 4" Line Voltage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nicor
Type: LED Recessed Retrofit Kits
Price: 9.98

The GU10 Whip allows you to convert recessed housings with a standard Medium/Edison base to one that now uses a GU10 base.

 

  • Male Edison/medium base to female GU10 base
  • Measures 12.5 in. in length
  • 660-Watt maximum wattage
  • Rated for up to 600-V

entry.title: Cooper 15 Amp GFCI Tamper and Weather Resistant Duplex Receptacle , White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cooper
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 21.39

GFCI Self-Test 15A -125V Tamper and Weather Resistant Duplex Receptacle with Standard Size Wallplate, White

Product Description

Specification Grade - Weather Resistant Duplex GFCIs are built to meet every need in commercial, industrial and institutional settings, whether permanent or temporary - and is fully compliant with the latest UL943 standards for GFCIs, providing the most recent change to the standard by offering self testing capability. Complies with 2011 NEC Article 406.9 that states that all receptacles installed in wet or damp locations must be weather resistant. Weather Resistant Receptacles offer protection from rain, snow, ice, moisture, and humidity when properly installed in an approved weather protective or while-in use cover. Weather resistant receptacles are for use in any residential or commercial outdoor location. Designed with enhanced nylon and corrosion resistant metal components Weather resistant receptacles are extra durable. Combine WR receptacles with any of our WeatherBox While-in-Use Protective Covers for tough protection against the elements.


Additional: Self-Test, Tamper and Weather Resistant, Temperature Rating: -35 to 66 deg C, Housing: Polypropylene (Top), PVC(Bottom)

entry.title: Cooper Industries PJ2W Wallplate 2G Toggle Poly Mid White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cooper
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 0.87

Coopers line of polycarbonate plates feature a rugged construction reduces installation cost due to less plate breakage. These plates resist bowing to provide a smooth, flat installation. They feature an exclusive timesaving Screw-Catch feature that holds mounting screws captive and simplifies installation. They are UL and cUL listed as well as CSA certified. Polycarbonate wallplates are virtually unbreakable with high structural rigidity, long-term form retention, plus superior impact and abrasion resistance. Their operating temperature is between -40C to 70C. Their heavy-duty construction provides outstanding performance throughout a home.

entry.title: Cooper 2-Gang Midway-Size GFCI Decorator Wallplate in White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cooper
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 3.12

Cooper Wiring Arrow Hart™ 2-Gang GFCI Decorator wallplate in white color features thermoplastic construction for enhanced durability. It offers an elegant high-gloss finish to your decor. Midway-size wallplate has 4.940 Inch x 4.880 Inch cutout for easy connectivity. It has a screw-catch feature that accommodates mounting screws in place. Impact resistant wallplate withstands bowing and can be flush-fitted to offer convenient installation. Decorator wallplate is compatible with GFCI devices. Wallplate includes matching mounting screws for easy installation. It is suitable for commercial applications. Wallplate is abrasion resistant and offers superior sturdiness

entry.title: Tamper Resistant Duplex Receptacle 15 Amp, White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cooper
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 2.50

Tamper Resistant Duplex Receptacles with Autoground provide compliance with 2011 NEC Article 406.12 that states that all receptacles installed in dwelling units must be tamper resistant. Durable impact-resistant thermoplastic face and back body is virtually unbreakable. “TR” designation provides visual identification. Terminal screws are backed out and ready to wire. Extra-long and extra-wide mounting straps with patented built-in wire stripper for #14 and #12 wire to speed installation. Side-wire terminals accept up to #10 solid or stranded wire and push-in terminals accept #14 solid wire.

Catalog Number TR270-9
Wiring Method Side Wire
Rating 15A 125V NEMA 5-15R
Tamper Resistant 2011 NEC Article 406.12 Compliant

entry.title: Cooper Wiring Devices Trace Dimmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cooper
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 15.99

Toggle dimmers provide a smooth slide, full range dimming for Incandescent lighting. In addition, one fully variable fan speed control is included in the product series. This line offers combined single-pole (single location) and 3-way (multi-location) units for 600W and 1000W lamp loads. All toggle dimmers are compatible with any traditional-style switch, wallplate or screwless wallplate.

 

  • Integrated toggle switch for ON/OFF and DIM/BRIGHT operation.
  • Matches existing wall switches.
  • Radio Frequency Interference (RFI) filtering for radio, audio and video equipment.
  • Replaces a standard switch and offers dimmer capabilities.
  • Compatible with any traditional switch, wallplate or screwless wallplate.

entry.title: Cooper Mid-Size 1-Gang Toggle Switch Wallplate, White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cooper
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 0.25

1-Gang mid size toggle switch wallplates are made of polycarbonate material. Polycarbonate wallplates are virtually unbreakable, with high structural rigidity, longterm form retention, and superior impact and abrasion resistance. Rugged construction reduces installation cost due to less plate breakage and resists bowing to provide a smooth, flat installation. Exclusive time saving screw-catch feature holds mounting screws captive and simplifies installation. High gloss finish is soil resistant. Mid sized to cover wall imperfections and large wallboard openings. Matching mounting screws provided. Available in white color. First gang to edge measures 1-5/9-Inch. Measures 3-1/8-Inch width by 4-7/8-Inch height.

entry.title: Cooper Decorator 0-10V Dimmer in White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cooper
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 49.98

Cooper Decorator 0-10V Dimmer in White

 The Eaton Wiring Devices 0-10V Dimmer provides full-range classic linear-slide dimming for 0-10 Volt compatible dimmable light sources. These units are ideal for residential and light commercial applications and are compatible with Eaton Wiring Devices Decorator style devices and wallplates. Units feature a preset “ON/OFF” switch that automatically returns controlled light(s) to a preset level without disturbing the brightness level. The device is designed for both Single-Pole (one location) and 3-Way (multi-location) applications.

 

 

  • Preset feature allows user to return to previous light level when turning lights ON
  • Integrated full-slide control for easy, precise operation
  • Can be wired as Single-Pole or 3-Way
  • Neutral is not required for installation of device
  • Adjustable high-level trim setting for optimal lamp compatibility
  • Face-plate is removable to allow for color changes
  • Each package includes 3 colors
  • Electrostatic discharge protection
  • Compatible with any decorator wallplate or screw-less decorator wallplate
  • Compatible with dimmable LED and Fluorescent 0-10 Volt ballasts

    •

entry.summary:

Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 38.88

Product Description: This occupancy/vacancy sensor provides a 180 degree field of view and turns lights On/Off automatically. The wall switch has a built in night light. Operating at 120V~277V with adjustable sensitivity and ambient light settings. Comes with a standard decorator wall plate.

Markets

  • Commercial
  • Residential
  • Education

Applications

  • Bathrooms
  • Bedrooms
  • Entryways
  • Closets
  • Living Areas
  • Hallways

Features & Benefits

  • Operates at 120V~277V
  • Turns lights On/Off automatically
  • Built in On/Off push button
  • Built in OCC/VAC slide button offers manual or auto on, always turns lights off automatically
  • Time delay Off, adjustable time delay from 15 seconds to 30 minutes
  • Built-in night light
  • Adjustable sensitivity and ambient light settings
  • Face Plate Included
  • Zero crossing function
  • Two Year Warranty
  • UL/CUL Listed

entry.title: Tan Winged Wire Connectors Bag of 500
entry.summary:
Vendor: NSI
Type: Wiring Devices
Price: 24.99

 

Product Details

• Size: 0.283 Inch ID x 0.720 Inch Width x 1.140 Inch Height
• Specifically designed for making positive ground connections and bonding non-metallic sheathed cable
• Swept-back wing design enables users to tighten connectors easily by hand

NSI Easy-Twist™ WWC Series Wire connector in tan color is made of durable thermoplastic. Connector shell is flame-resistant and has a temperature rating of 105 deg C. The deep skirt entry offers protection from flash over and shorts. It has sure-grip ribs for better gripping of the connector. Wire connector has compact design that provides proper installation even in tight spaces. It consists of thread funnel entry that leads the wires easily without pre-twisting.

Connector can withstand maximum voltage of 300 - 600 Volts. It measures 0.283 Inch internal diameter x 0.720 Inch x 1.140 Inch. Connector accommodates wires of size 22 - 8 AWG. Connector is UL listed.
